author: Taylor Hall
description: Easy drinking, neither sweet or sour, this cocktail with its subtle coffee notes suits breakfast, teatime or aperitivo but was originally created as a dessert cocktail.
name: Clockwork Orange No.2
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
